author: @liteforex
title: Unemployment Change. Germany, 09:55 (GMT+2)
text:
At 09:55 (GMT+2), Germany will publish March data on Unemployment Change. The growth trend indicates weakness in the national labor market and has a negative effect on consumer spending and, consequently, on economic growth. The figure is expected to rise from 5.0 thousand to 14.0 thousand, putting pressure on euro quotes.
28Mar.202508:55
topics: Economy, Business and Finance->financial and economic news

author: gloslivenews@reachplc.com (Phil Norris)
title: Met Office issues severe weather warning for Gloucestershire as cold front heads to UK
text:
A severe
weather warning has been issued for much of Gloucestershire over the weekend as the weather takes a cold turn. The Met Office has sounded the alarm for strong winds from 11am on Saturday (December 30) to 3am on Sunday (New Year's Eve).
The strong winds come in the wake of
Storm Gerrit which brought chaos to much of the UK. The cold front will move across England and Wales and will also bring some heavy rain, especially in parts of Wales.
There could be some disruption to
traffic and travel with delays on the roads and railway, as well as potential for air delays and ferry routes in the West Country. Power cuts and public transport delays are also possible during the warning times.
READ MORE:
Live flood warnings in Gloucestershire with UK snow risk amid 2024 cold snap forecast
READ MORE:
BBC weather presenter Carol Kirkwood announces marriage
The
Met Office chief forecaster said: "An active cold front will move east across England and Wales during Saturday and into Sunday and will be characterised by strong winds and some heavy rain. Gusts of 45-50 mph widely, but squally near the cold front with some gusts around 60 mph, whilst the strongest gusts are likely near coasts in the west and south, with 65-75 mph in places."
The warning area covers the Forest of Dean, Gloucester, Cheltenham, Stroud and much of the Cotswolds. Newent, Tewkesbury and Stow-on-the-Wold area outside the yellow alert zone.
The worst of the rain is forecast to fall from around 6pm on Saturday through to 3am on Sunday. Wind gusts could be up to 42mph on the Saturday evening.
The forecast rain comes at a time when parts of the River Severn has been placed under a Flood Warning by the
Environment Agency, meaning flooding is expected, act now. Lesser Flood Alerts are in place on the whole of the River Severn and River Wye.
A severe weather warning has also been issued for rain in parts of Wales from 10am on Saturday to 6pm on Saturday, with the eastern edge not far from the Gloucestershire border. Heavy rainfall in rain often leads to increased flood risk in Gloucestershire.
The Met Office said its Irish counterpart, Met Eireann, could name another storm â€“ Storm Hank â€“ as a â€œdeep area of low pressureâ€ pushes strong winds across the Republic of Ireland on Saturday. Meteorologist Alex Burkill said Saturday is going to turn â€œwet and windyâ€ across the UK with a band of â€œintense rainâ€ pushing its way eastwards and north-eastwards to bring a risk of gales and possibly â€œsevere galesâ€ in exposed spots.
In a forecast video, Mr Burkill said northern areas as well as high ground areas in Scotland are likely to see â€œsignificant snowâ€, with possibly 10 to 20cm of snow building up on the highest grounds. He said: â€œThereâ€™s a potential for some snow accumulations, even as low as perhaps 100m up, we could see some slushy snow, so likely to see some travel disruption again, because of the wind, the rain and some snow like weâ€™ve seen over some recent days."

iPhone or Android and comment on this story.

Cuando parecÃ­a haberse estabilizado, la moneda registrÃ³ otra importante pÃ©rdida. El tipo de cambio cerrÃ³ la jornada en 17.8881 unidades por dÃ³lar. Frente al cierre de 17.5329 unidades de ayer, con datos oficiales del Banco de MÃ©xico (Banxico), perdiÃ³ 35.52 centavos, que son equivalentes a una depreciaciÃ³n de 2.03 por ciento. El precio del dÃ³lar se moviÃ³ tras la noticia a un mÃ¡ximo de 18.0123 pesos desde un nivel mÃ­nimo de 17.4459 pesos. El Ãndice DÃ³lar (DXY), del Intercontinental Exchange, que mide al billete verde con seis referencias, perdÃ­a 0.14% a 104.12 puntos. "El tipo de cambio tiene una reacciÃ³n fuerte, despuÃ©s de que el diputado de Morena Ignacio Mier adelantÃ³ que en septiembre se votarÃ¡n 18 reformas, como la del Poder Judicial", dijo Juan Carlos Cruz, docente de la Escuela Bancaria y Comercial. Falsa calma y atenciÃ³n en la Fed PrÃ¡cticamente toda la sesiÃ³n el peso habÃ­a mostrado una estabilidad que difiere del sentimiento observado en los mercados locales, despuÃ©s de que en el inicio de esta semana registraron el peor dÃ­a de los activos mexicanos desde la pandemia. "La divisa sigue mostrando volatilidad por los resultados de las elecciones, aunque cada vez mÃ¡s acotada", afirmÃ³ Monex. "Con ello, la atenciÃ³n de los operadores estÃ¡ regresando a las seÃ±ales de lo que harÃ¡n los principales bancos centrales". El Banco Central Europeo (BCE) recortÃ³ hoy sus tasas de interÃ©s en 25 puntos base, reconociendo el progreso contra la alta inflaciÃ³n. La decisiÃ³n pone mÃ¡s presiÃ³n a la Reserva Federal (Fed) de cara su decisiÃ³n monetaria la prÃ³xima semana. Mientras llega esa fecha, los inversionistas ponen atenciÃ³n en las cifras de empleo estadounidenses, que serÃ¡n clave para el anÃ¡lisis de la Fed. author: Kinga Piotrowska
title: Love Island fans 'shocked' after discovering age gap between Elma and Sammy
text:
Love Island fans were stunned by the age gap between Elma Pazar and Sammy Root after the pair were seen together in the hideaway.
Sammy and Elma share a history, having first met on the TOWIE circuit before reuniting on last nightâ€™s episode of All Stars.
Rumours swirled in 2023 that the two were dating, shortly before Sammy was announced as a new TOWIE cast member.
During the latest episode, Sammy made his entrance as the newest bombshell and chose Elma to join him in the hideaway.
The pair were delighted to see each other and wasted no time catching up, appearing smitten as they sat together on the bed.
However, fans quickly pointed out their significant age difference.
Sammy is 23, while Elma is 32.
One viewer took to X to comment, saying, â€œIâ€™ve seen a lot of people saying Sammy and Elma because they were on TOWIE together? Mind you, he was 17 when Elma first went on Love Island. We need an age restriction of like 25 because thatâ€™s insane.â€
Sorry Elma is 32 and Sammy is 23 - ainâ€™t no way ðŸ˜­ðŸ˜­ðŸ˜­
â€” AJBðŸ¾ (@Anutweeted)[#loveisland][#LoveIslandAllStars][pic.twitter.com/ss5wdk2T4t][January 29, 2025]
Before entering the villa, Sammy had hinted that a romance with Elma could be on the cards when asked about reuniting with familiar faces.
So Sammy is 23 and Elma is 32. Thatâ€™s a BIG gap!
â€” Abigail (@yesindede)[#LoveIslandAllStars][pic.twitter.com/w62GX0Y12b][January 29, 2025]
At 32, Elma is nine years older than 23-year-old Sammy.

author: Laura Sanchez
title: Vinyl Sales in the UK Hit Their Highest Point Since 1990
text: In an astonishing revelation, the British Phonographic Industry (BPI) has declared a successful 16th consecutive year of escalating sales, showcasing the resurgence of physical music formats. The BPI's latest report reveals that the vinyl market has experienced an impressive surge, skyrocketing at a rate more than four times faster, boasting an 11.7 per cent rise, amounting to 5.9 million units in 2023 according to [NME](https://www.nme.com/news/music/uk-vinyl-sales-2023-reach-highest-level-since-1990-3563676). Topping the charts as the best-selling album of the year is Taylor Swift's '1989 (Taylor's Version),' closely followed by The Rolling Stones' 'Hackney Diamonds.' According to the BPI's insightful analysis, this resurgence reflects a continuing demand for vinyl albums and other physical music releases, creating a thriving market on the high street. The report attributes this success to the popularity of independent record stores, with iconic shops like HMV leading the way, having reopened its flagship store on London's Oxford Street this year. Delving into the specifics, the report highlights that seven out of the top 10 vinyl LP sellers were releases from 2023, including Swift's 'Speak Now (Taylor's Version),' Blur's 'The Ballad Of Darren,' Lana Del Rey's 'Did You Know There's A Tunnel Under Ocean Blvd,' Lewis Capaldi's 'Broken By Desire To Be Heavenly Sent,' and Kylie Minogue's 'Tension.' Notably, British artists played a significant role in fueling the vinyl growth, contributing to over 40 per cent of the 100 most-purchased vinyl LPs of 2023, with recent releases from The 1975, Depeche Mode, Gorillaz, and Maisie Peters leading the charge. Classic albums and re-issues also continued to captivate audiences in 2023, with top sellers including Fleetwood Mac's 'Rumours,' Courteeners' 'St Jude,' De La Soul's '3 Feet High And Rising,' and Oasis' 'The Masterplan.' Dr. Jo Twist OBE, BPI Chief Executive, expressed optimism about the resilience of the UK music market, emphasizing that the revival of physical formats, especially vinyl, provides consumers with diverse choices to enjoy their favorite music. Interestingly, despite the dominance of streaming, the CD market displayed its smallest annual decline in nearly a decade in 2023, indicating a potential stabilization. As we eagerly await the final figures for vinyl LP, CD, and cassette sales in 2023, set to be disclosed by the BPI on January 3, 2024, it is clear that the music industry is experiencing a remarkable renaissance in physical formats, challenging the digital age narrative.
